item.title: Polymer
item.description:
Polymer

If you haven’t taken a look at Google’s Polymer and Material Design yet, you should. If only because Google is pushing for it and that will undoubtedly have some reflection in search rankings.

item.title: The Art of Troubleshooting
item.description:
The Art of Troubleshooting

The Problem

Out of nowhere one website started, seemingly randomly, displaying a blank screen as the homepage. When this was first brought to my attention, I did a quick look at the HTML source and confirmed that there was nothing. No errors, no opening and closing tags, just nothing. So I’m getting a blank 200 OK response from the server. Weird.

item.title: Installing
item.description:
Installing

This setup requires Redis, of course, and the django-redis plugin. Installing and setup is pretty straight-forward.
